page.title: 05SALTBURN:LEISURE FACILITIES.
page.content: Saltburn and Skelton are well equipped with leisure facilities with Saltburn having most of them. Excluding the leisure centre there is a golf course, BMX track, Cricket Club, Youth Hostel, Football pitches, Tennis Club, Riding Stables, Bowls and recreational parks. We interviewed 43 people of both sexes whose ages ranged from 10 to over 60. Most people using the centre came from nearby places such as Marske, Skelton, Redcar and Guisborough. The rest lived in Saltburn. The most used facility at the centre is the swimming pool followed by badminton. Other sports include weight training, gymnastics, squash, indoor bowls, scuba diving and canoeing. Saltburn & Marske Swimming Club are also based at the centre. Improvements could include all day opening, a bigger pool, diving boards, wave machines and an indoor BMX track.
